languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Пустотная присказка{/d} явно подбадривает поникшего Кляйна.{/n} "На кракена этот дохляк не тянет! Есть таранить! Мокрого места не оставлю, на куски разделаю подонка!"

{n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Пустотная присказка{/d} явно подбадривает поникшего Кляйна.{/n} "На кракена этот дохляк не тянет! Есть таранить! Мокрого места не оставлю, на куски разделаю подонка!"

{n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"

languages.text: {n}Kleins veränderter Miene zufolge scheint die alte {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Raumfahrer-Redensart{/d} seine Moral gestärkt zu haben.{/n} "Dieser verfaulende Kadaver ist kein Kraken, so viel steht fest! Befehle erhalten, Lord Captain! Ich werde ihn in Stücke schneiden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kleins veränderter Miene zufolge scheint die alte {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Raumfahrer-Redensart{/d} seine Moral gestärkt zu haben.{/n} "Dieser verfaulende Kadaver ist kein Kraken, so viel steht fest! Befehle erhalten, Lord Captain! Ich werde ihn in Stücke schneiden!"

languages.text: {n}À en juger par son soudain changement d'expression, le vieux {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}dicton cosmomarin{/d} semble avoir remonté le moral de Klein.{/n} « Je peux vous dire que cette vieille carcasse pourrie n'est absolument pas un kraken ! Mais à vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je vais le réduire en miettes ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}À en juger par son soudain changement d'expression, le vieux {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}dicton cosmomarin{/d} semble avoir remonté le moral de Klein.{/n} « Je peux vous dire que cette vieille carcasse pourrie n'est absolument pas un kraken ! Mais à vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je vais le réduire en miettes ! »

languages.text: {n}A juzgar por el cambio en la expresión de Klein, el antiguo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}dicho de infante del vacío{/d} parece haberle mejorado la moral.{/n} «¡Pues permita que le diga que ese cadáver putrefacto no es ningún kraken! ¡Orden recibida, Lord Capitán! ¡Lo haré trizas!».
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A juzgar por el cambio en la expresión de Klein, el antiguo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}dicho de infante del vacío{/d} parece haberle mejorado la moral.{/n} «¡Pues permita que le diga que ese cadáver putrefacto no es ningún kraken! ¡Orden recibida, Lord Capitán! ¡Lo haré trizas!».

languages.text: {n}クライの表情の変化から判断するに、老いた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイズマンの言い習わし{/d}が彼の機嫌をよくしたようだ。{/n}「あの腐った死骸はクラーケンなんかじゃない！ご命令、承りました、ロード・キャプテン！あいつをズタズタに引き裂いていやる！」
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}クライの表情の変化から判断するに、老いた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイズマンの言い習わし{/d}が彼の機嫌をよくしたようだ。{/n}「あの腐った死骸はクラーケンなんかじゃない！ご命令、承りました、ロード・キャプテン！あいつをズタズタに引き裂いていやる！」

languages.text: {n}从克莱因的表情来看，那句{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}船员的谚语{/d}让他的精神振作了很多。{/n}“放心吧，那只是具腐烂的尸体，不是什么虚空海怪！收到命令，舰长大人！我要把它剁成碎片！”
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}从克莱因的表情来看，那句{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}船员的谚语{/d}让他的精神振作了很多。{/n}“放心吧，那只是具腐烂的尸体，不是什么虚空海怪！收到命令，舰长大人！我要把它剁成碎片！”

languages.text: {n}Klein'ın yüz ifadesindeki değişime bakılırsa o eski {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuz eri deyişi{/d}, herkesin moralini yükseltmiş gibi görünüyor.{/n} "O çürümüş leşin krakenle alakası yok, bundan emin olabilirsiniz! Emirleriniz yerine getirilecek Lord Kaptan! Onu parçalarına ayıracağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the change in Klein's expression, the old {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman saying{/d} appears to have improved his spirits.{/n} "That rotting carcass is no kraken, I can tell you that! Orders received, Lord Captain! I'll carve him up into shreds!"
